column2: this place is like Kaizen-heaven. Yes
column3: there is always a line. But they're efficient and as a former supply chain manager
column4: that's my sweet spot. When you arrive
column5: you give your name and phone number. That puts you on the list and they give you updates on where you are in line. Then the hostess gives you a menu and recommends you order with the cashier
column6: because a deep dish pizza takes a while to cook since it's so big.
